title: Blog App
description: Developed a dynamic blog website using React, allowing users to add, delete, and bookmark blogs for an engaging and interactive experience.

title: Todo List
description: Created a feature-rich todo list website using React, enabling users to add, delete, edit, and mark tasks as complete for effective task management.

title: Expense Tracker
description: Built an expense tracker website using React for the frontend and Motoko for the backend, providing a seamless and efficient solution for managing finances in a web3 environment.
